prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: The World of Horticulture
Title: A Deep Dive into the Intricacies of Bonsai Tree Care
Description: This detailed guide provides a comprehensive understanding of the art of Bonsai, covering everything from watering techniques to pruning schedules, perfect for beginners and experts alike. Plus, get exclusive insights from top Bonsai Masters around the globe.
No, I am not interested in bonsai trees or horticulture in general.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Global Gourmet
Title: Fusion Food Trends: Blending Culinary Cultures
Description: Explore the latest trends in fusion cuisine, blending flavors from different cultures to create unique dishes. This article takes you on a global gastronomic journey, showcasing top chefs' innovative recipes and providing tips to try fusion cooking at home.
Yes! I am extremely interested in cooking, especially cooking experiences at home.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceFrontiers
Title: The Quantum Realm: Unveiling the Enigma
Description: Dive into the mystifying cosmos as we delve deep into quantum physics, exploring its implications for our understanding of the universe. This article simplifies complex concepts and illustrates them with real-life examples making it accessible for both seasoned physicists and curious explorers.
Yes. I like to unravel scientific mysteries and learn complex concepts like these. I am especially interested in quantum mechanics.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SocialPsychologyToday
Title: The Influence of Social Media on Society: A Psychological Analysis
Description: This article explores the profound effects of social media on our behaviors, emotions, and relationships, with insights from leading psychologists. It delves into the benefits and pitfalls of our digital lives, covering topics like cyberbullying, fake news, social comparison, and addiction. Additionally, it offers practical tips on maintaining mental well-being in the face of these challenges.
Yes, I studied psychology in school asnd I like to keep up-to-date on modern challengesl ike social media and disinformation.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenLivingTimes
Title: Sustainable Living: Practical Ways to Reduce Your Carbon Footprint
Description: In this comprehensive guide, we discuss practical ways to lead a more sustainable life. From alternative energy sources to recycling tips, eco-friendly home upgrades to low-impact transportation, this article covers a wide range of information for those looking to make a practical, positive impact on the environment. Expert commentary from climate scientists and sustainable living advocates also provides valuable insights into the current state of our planet and how our daily actions can help or hurt.
No, i am not interested in learning morea bout living green.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalHighlights
Title: Medieval Architecture: From Castles to Cathedrals
Description: Uncover the rich history and intricate designs of medieval architecture in Europe. This article takes you through the evolution of architectural styles during the middle ages, the socio-political factors that influenced these changes, as well as the enduring impact of these architectural marvels on contemporary design. Accompanied by high-resolution imagery and 3D renderings, this article is a must-read for architecture enthusiasts and history buffs.
I am a huge history buff, so I would love to learn morea bout medieval architecture.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureSportTech
Title: The Evolution of eSports: The Digital Revolution in Competitive Gaming
Description: This comprehensive review delves into the fast-paced world of eSports, charting its rise from niche pastime to global phenomenon. Covering the impact of technology on game design, the sociology of gaming communities, and the economics of eSports tournaments, this article is a deep-dive into a rapidly evolving industry. It also provides insights into the psychological aspects of competitive gaming, exploring the mindset of top players and the challenges they face.
No, sports is not among my interests.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AppliedEconomicsToday
Title: The Future of Cryptocurrency: Blockchain, Bitcoin and Beyond
Description: This detailed article dives into the world of cryptocurrency and its potential impact on global economics. It covers everything from the basics of blockchain technology to the latest trends in Bitcoin trading. With interviews from top industry experts, forecasts for future growth, and an exploration of regulatory challenges and opportunities, this article provides a comprehensive guide for anyone interested in digital finance and technology.
No, I am not interested in learning about blockchain currencies.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticJourneys
Title: Exploring Abstract Art: The Power of Interpretation 
Description: Delve into the enigmatic world of abstract art in this engaging article. Explore the history, key figures, and landmark works that have shaped this avant-garde movement. You'll also learn about the psychology of interpretation, and how the ambiguity of abstract art allows for a diverse range of personal meanings and emotional responses. This article is ideal for art enthusiasts seeking to broaden their understanding and appreciation of abstract art and its powerful ability to transcend traditional visual boundaries.
Abstract art does not interest me. I prefer text media.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ExtremeAdventures
Title: Conquering the Unconquered: A Journey to the Earth’s Most Remote Corners
Description: This thrilling article takes you on a virtual expedition to the most remote and untouched corners of our planet. From the wild landscapes of the Siberian taiga to the depths of the Mariana Trench, experience the thrill of discovery and the beauty of pristine nature through the eyes of seasoned adventurers. Understand the complexities of survival in harsh environments, and get a glimpse of rare wildlife and ecosystems. This comprehensive guide is a must-read for those who love travel, adventure, and exploration.
yes, I'd love to learn more about the most remote areas of the earth, which I will never visit

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: NanoSciencesJournal
Title: Nanotechnology in Medicine: Revolutionizing Healthcare
Description: This in-depth article presents an overview of how nanotechnology is transforming medical diagnosis, treatment and prevention. Covering topics such as targeted drug delivery, regenerative medicine, and early disease detection, it also addresses potential ethical and safety issues in nanomedicine. Interviews with leading researchers and health professionals provide expert insights into these cutting-edge developments. For anyone interested in the future of healthcare and breakthrough scientific advancements, this article is an essential read.
Nanotechnology is deifnitely among my interrests. This article would go on my reading list.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MetaphysicalMindset
Title: Unraveling the Mysteries of the Universe: A Spiritual Perspective
Description: This thought-provoking article explores the spiritual aspects of the cosmos, examining ancient and contemporary beliefs about the universe's creation, purpose, and destiny. It delves into various philosophical theories, transcultural spiritual practices, unexplained phenomena, and the interplay between science and spirituality. Featuring insights from world-renowned spiritual leaders, quantum physicists, and philosophers, this is a comprehensive guide for those seeking a deeper understanding of life's profound questions.
Yes.

feedback.feedback_other: I would love to see resultso n how the Chatbot did evaluating me.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
